hizbs.text: inna l-laha faliqu l-habi wal-nawa yukh'riju l-haya mina l-mayiti wamukh'riju l-mayiti mina l-hayi dhalikumu l-lahu fa-anna tu'fakuna
faliqu l-is'bahi wajaʿala al-layla sakanan wal-shamsa wal-qamara hus'banan dhalika taqdiru l-ʿazizi l-ʿalimi
wahuwa alladhi jaʿala lakumu l-nujuma litahtadu biha fi zulumati l-bari wal-bahri qad fassalna l-ayati liqawmin yaʿlamuna
wahuwa alladhi ansha-akum min nafsin wahidatin famus'taqarrun wamus'tawdaʿun qad fassalna l-ayati liqawmin yafqahuna

wahuwa alladhi anzala mina l-samai maan fa-akhrajna bihi nabata kulli shayin fa-akhrajna min'hu khadiran nukh'riju min'hu habban mutarakiban wamina l-nakhli min talʿiha qin'wanun daniyatun wajannatin min aʿnabin wal-zaytuna wal-rumana mush'tabihan waghayra mutashabihin unzuru ila thamarihi idha athmara wayanʿihi inna fi dhalikum laayatin liqawmin yu'minuna
wajaʿalu lillahi shurakaa l-jina wakhalaqahum wakharaqu lahu banina wabanatin bighayri ʿil'min sub'hanahu wataʿala ʿamma yasifuna
badiʿu l-samawati wal-ardi anna yakunu lahu waladun walam takun lahu sahibatun wakhalaqa kulla shayin wahuwa bikulli shayin ʿalimun
dhalikumu l-lahu rabbukum la ilaha illa huwa khaliqu kulli shayin fa-uʿ'buduhu wahuwa ʿala kulli shayin wakilun
la tud'rikuhu l-absaru wahuwa yud'riku l-absara wahuwa l-latifu l-khabiru
qad jaakum basairu min rabbikum faman absara falinafsihi waman ʿamiya faʿalayha wama ana ʿalaykum bihafizin
wakadhalika nusarrifu l-ayati waliyaqulu darasta walinubayyinahu liqawmin yaʿlamuna
ittabiʿ ma uhiya ilayka min rabbika la ilaha illa huwa wa-aʿrid ʿani l-mush'rikina
walaw shaa l-lahu ma ashraku wama jaʿalnaka ʿalayhim hafizan wama anta ʿalayhim biwakilin
wala tasubbu alladhina yadʿuna min duni l-lahi fayasubbu l-laha ʿadwan bighayri ʿil'min kadhalika zayyanna likulli ummatin ʿamalahum thumma ila rabbihim marjiʿuhum fayunabbi-uhum bima kanu yaʿmaluna
wa-aqsamu bil-lahi jahda aymanihim la-in jaathum ayatun layu'minunna biha qul innama l-ayatu ʿinda l-lahi wama yush'ʿirukum annaha idha jaat la yu'minuna
wanuqallibu afidatahum wa-absarahum kama lam yu'minu bihi awwala marratin wanadharuhum fi tugh'yanihim yaʿmahuna
